original: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: sa āsavam ca iva no ca āsavam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na āsavaḥ ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Āsavañceva sāsavañca akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca noāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: āsavam ca iva sa āsavam ca akusalam dhammam paṭicca no āsavaḥ ca iva na anāsavaḥ ca na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi

original: Sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: sa āsavam ca iva no ca āsavam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na anāsavaḥ ca iva na no ca āsavaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
